data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Médéa, Algeria be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Médéa, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Médéa, Algeria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Médéa words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Médéa, Algeria the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Dui-Menia people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we pray that the people of Médéa, Algeria will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Médéa, Algeria to the gospel today.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 559 believers living in the state of Médéa. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.
